category.name: General
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: RDV_variant_overlays_uses_true_availability
preference.preference_description: Determines whether rule checks and variability are evaluated in the variants overlay only (VOO) analysis when using RDV. Valid Values: TRUE - Expands conditions into True Availability statements. May slow VOO analysis. FALSE - Conditions are not expanded.
